title: Golden police officer tries to stop road-rage incident, fires weapon
text:
Published By: Denver Post Local - Today 
A off-duty Golden police officer fired his weapon into the front end of a motorcycle while attempting to stop a rider involved in a road rag... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
